content: Make your way around the arena, picking off the Flamlings so you can focus on the Mother. Continue dodging around the Mother while slashing away to wear down her HP bar and eventually defeat the Mother of Flamlings. If you're struggling with this battle, some Body-Cooling Powder will help with any Burn Damage you might be incurring.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mother of Flamlings Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Make your way around the arena, picking off the Flamlings so you can focus on the Mother. Continue dodging around the Mother while slashing away to wear down her HP bar and eventually defeat the Mother of Flamlings. If you're struggling with this battle, some Body-Cooling Powder will help with any Burn Damage you might be incurring.
